name: Decidu-run
description:
Play as a forest spirit trying to revive a recently decayed forest to it's colorful beauty. Circle around the objects in the world with the trail you leave, but be careful. Decay sprites will try to kill you before you can finish.

Made for Global Game Jam 2020

https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/decidu-run-9

Game version lags on browser currently.
